title: FDJ-Suez, UAE Team ADQ Bolster Squads with Key Staff Appointments
content:
Cherie Pridham moves to UAE Team ADQ as head of sport while Lieselot Decroix joins FDJ-Suez as co-head of performance.

Read the full article at FDJ-Suez, UAE Team ADQ Bolster Squads with Key Staff Appointments on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
